title: ESPN's Kevin Arnovitz
description:
Zach and ESPN's Kevin Arnovitz discuss the Jazz, Bucks, and Hawks ahead their Christmas Day games -- and touch on what the Knicks should do without Derrick Rose. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
